name: n0playground prototype
description:
Get ready to bounce, roll, and snap your way through this wacky movement platformer! Featuring a set of 8 elastic balls that can grow, shrink, and split, this game offers endless possibilities for creative movement. With a plugin system that lets you swim in water and modify gravity, this polished prototype is sure to be a hit!

Main Gameplay Video

Controls:

- Left Arrow / A: Move Left
- Right Arrow / D: Move Right
- Up Arrow: Grow/Open door
- Down Arrow: Shrink
- Hold Down: Split into 8 balls
- Release Down: Elastic snap back into position
- Space: Jump
- H / ESC: Teleport Back Home

This was the last build that was possible before unfortunate events happened.
This game would not be possible without Shapes by Freya Holmer!!!

I was not able to create the storyline for the game so i appologize for the steep learning curve
